article_title: The Internet has a new hobby: trolling campaign websites
article_text:
Fake campaign websites often go viral on social media

Some redirect users to other sites as a joke; others use it as a platform to criticize

JebBush.com received a lot of attention after it was redirected to Trump’s site

article_metadata.news-keywords: Campaign, 2016 Election, Donald Trump, Jeb Bush, Carly Fiorina, Ted Cruz, Twitter, Facebook, social media, YouTube, Please clap, jeb!, troll, twitter, election, jeb hug, carly, internet, website
article_metadata.description: This week, a delighted Internet audience discovered that JebBush.com redirects visitors to front-runner Donald Trump’s campaign website.
article_metadata.title: The Internet has a new hobby: trolling campaign websites | Miami Herald
